item.title: Roadmap & Demo
item.description: 😁 Iomeva Tech Roadmap Slot game template Proof of concept, responsiveness, basic workflows More slot game assets and workflows (animations, game modes, graphics) Basic web presentation Iomeva Lite Game Backend (dashboard, reports, simulations ) Solution containerization, pipeline Publish Solution Demo Game documentation for 3rd party game integrations Backend documentation for 3rd party wallet integrations Make a bunch of games 😬 Iomeva Biz Roadmap Grow LinkedIn (connect, post, network) Build a brand Build a network of clients (let’s work together 🤝) Work on other people’s projects (I can make games for you 🧑‍💼) Get funding❓💰 Playable Interactive Game Demo In very early phase, work in progress.
